messages.subject: Home education (homeschooling...especially unschooling) under threat in Britain
messages.msgSnippet: Please sign this international petition and ask others to do the same... http://www.gopetition.com/petitions/support-homeschoolers-in-england.html A review has
messages.messageBody:
Please sign this international petition and ask others to do the same...

http://www.gopetition.com/petitions/support-homeschoolers-in-england.html

A review has taken place of home education and the proposals are outrageous, including giving Local Authorities the powers to demand access to our homes and interview our children alone! (Even when they have no cause for concern)

There is also now an international petition to support home educators in Sweden who are facing Home education being banned. Please sign, and pass on!

http://rohus.nu/?English_information:Petition

Thank you!
Best wishes
Rachel.
